籤詩版本二:
Mphepo ikayatsa makandulo ndi mithunzi yochepa m’mwamba, imakhala ngati maluwa pagalasi m’chiziŵitso.
Ndatopa ndikupemphedwa ndi ana kuti andisamalire, ndikudziwa bwanji kuti ndi chinyengo chabe?
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ili ngati mphepo yoyatsa kandulo.
Mbiri yonyenga imawononga chilichonse.
解曰: Chuma chili kumwamba. Umphawi ndi tsogolo. Palibe chifukwa chofunsira malangizo. Onse anakonzedweratu.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ulendo Wachisanu ndi chimodzi wa Kong Ming kuchokera ku Qishan
Panthawi ya Mafumu Atatu, Qishan Mountain inadutsa Wei ndi Shu. Kong Ming mobwerezabwereza anapita ku Qishan Mountain kukamenyana ndi Wei koma analephera.
Nthawi yachisanu ndi chimodzi yomwe adapita ku Qishan, Kong Ming adalemba malangizo ake, koma pamapeto pake sanapambane. Pamapeto pake, Zhuge Liang anamwalira ndi matenda ku Wuzhangyuan ali ndi zaka 54 chifukwa chogwira ntchito mopitirira muyeso.
(Nkhani iyi ndi fanizo la "nzeru sizilingana ndi karma").
聖意: Pemphererani nyumba yanu, chenjerani, funani chuma ndi phindu, khalani osamala pabizinesi, samalani m'banja mwanu, samalani m'banja, khalani otetezeka ku Liujia, dabwa, wodutsa, kutayika kwa mphutsi za silika, kutayika kwa ziweto, kutayika kwa ziweto. munthu, wosowa, mlandu wapagulu, kutayika kwa anthu osamuka, kusungika, kutaya katundu, matenda oyipa, upandu wa kusinthidwa kwa manda a Yinshan
古人: Ulendo Wachisanu ndi chimodzi wa Kongming kuchokera ku Qishan
第X籤: Lottery ya makumi asanu ndi anayi mphambu zisanu ndi ziwiri
